docs.text: Overview mdocfile is Python package for working with SerialEM mdoc files. Quickstart mdocfile.read() will return the contents of an mdoc file as a pandas dataframe. import mdocfile df = mdocfile . read ( 'my_mdoc_file.mdoc' ) Installation pip: pip install mdocfile
docs.title: Overview
